General.Name: MPX International Corporation
General.Description: MPX International Corporation, a cannabis company, focuses on the medical and adult-use cannabis markets in Canada and Switzerland. It is involved in producing and distributing three types of products, such as cannabis flowers, cannabis extract and related products, and cannabis derivatives under the Strain Rec and Salus BioPharma brands. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 5255 Yonge Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M2N 6P4
